parameter.value: Interesting books, isn't it? I've read most of them.
I don't own this library, I'm just working here. I like the silence and peace it brings.
Ah. The bookshelves behind that door is only for members.
Only members may enter the sealed section.
I always thought the archdemons to be a race of mystique.
The godslayer is truly an amazing story. Shame it's just an invention to scare children.
Ninjas are like fairies... they don't exist.
Hello, |PLAYERNAME|. I'm satisfied as long as you're silent.
